Player History
Drafted in 19th round, 303rd overall pick, by Atlanta in 2015...
Was claimed off waivers by St. Louis (B) on 4/7/2015.
Traded from St. Louis (B) to Cincinnati on 5/11/2015 (Going to CIN: P Samuel Valenzuela. Going to SLB: 1B Jason Hults)...
Earned first career win on 6/15/2017...
Injured on 5/23/2019 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 2019...
1/31/2020: Gets a new one-year contract worth $811,429 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 7/6/2020 with a Tight Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 2020...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $811,429 through salary arbitration...
Had first career hit on 4/3/2021, off Robert Gonzalez (SLB)...
